oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Benjamin E. Carmichael correspondence with Roy Batchelor, 1966 June 17
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Carmichael, Benjamin E.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter from Benjamin Carmichael, superintendent of Chattanooga Public Schools, to Roy Batchelor, directior of the Community Action Board, concerning Chattanooga's Head Start program and desegregation in those facilities.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Segregation in education -- Tennessee -- Chattanooga
Chattanooga Public Schools (Chattanooga, Tennessee)

Chattanooga Board of Education records and correspondence, 1965-1969
